name: Nothing Stays Forever - The Game
description:
"Nothing Stays Forever - The Game" is a puzzle solving creation for Weekly Game Jam Week 160. In this game, you play as an Infinite Symbol that just came to the realization that nothing in fact stays forever. His world got flip turned around with a new goal... To stay as long as possible by collecting hour glasses scattered around a seemingly endless maze. 

Control the character by using the W, A, S and D keys on the keyboard to navigate the maze. Collect hourglasses by moving over-top of them to extend the timer.
